name: n2step-qrgenerator-web
description: Key QR Code Generator Web App
author: n2step@ubique.ch

scripts.build:dev: webpack --config webpack.dev.js --env BASE_URL='https://qr-dev.n2s.ch' --env GIT_INFO="$(git log -1 --format='%h, %ad' --date=format:'%d.%m.%Y, %H:%M')" --env PUBLIC_KEY='dac7415a963eacc9d9d698f7d820b25f7e7906482ad121fb652eefa08ec29129' --env UPLOAD_URL='upload-dev.n2s.ch'
scripts.build:prod: webpack --config webpack.prod.js --env BASE_URL='https://qr.n2s.ch' --env GIT_INFO="$(git log -1 --format='%h, %ad' --date=format:'%d.%m.%Y, %H:%M')" --env PUBLIC_KEY='b83ddb8ea6b76efe407d1006a42ed5f450f2c75120ac676aadf08f874745590b' --env UPLOAD_URL='upload.n2s.ch'
scripts.dev-server: webpack serve --config webpack.dev.js --env BASE_URL='https://qr-dev.n2s.ch' --env GIT_INFO="$(git log -1 --format='%h, %ad' --date=format:'%d.%m.%Y, %H:%M')" --env PUBLIC_KEY='dac7415a963eacc9d9d698f7d820b25f7e7906482ad121fb652eefa08ec29129' --env UPLOAD_URL='upload-dev.n2s.ch'
